name: Tutorial 1: Git and VS Code
description: This is our first tutorial! We will be introducing Git and Visual Studio Code by creating an animated display of club members.

name: Tutorial 2: HTML and CSS
description: This tutorial introduces the languages used in sites across the web. It walks through the creation of a static webpage from scratch.

name: Tutorial 3: JavaScript
description: This tutorial introduces you to the scripting language of the web. It walks through the creation of a dynamic webpage.
